jshubinspector.description:
The jsHub Inspector provides a visible UI for the inspection of data and events 
collected by the jsHub core tag. See http://jshub.org/ for more details.
jshubinspector.requires: utilities container resize accordionview json2 sha1
jshubinspector.name: jshubinspector

YAHOO.JSHUB_ORG.Inspector.name: YAHOO.JSHUB_ORG.Inspector

STATUS.default:
info
info
String : No jsHub core lib on page or other problem.
warning
String : Either the checksum of the jsHub core lib failed or there are duplicate metadata entries on the page.
error
String : Something went wrong with the Inspector.
success
String : Everything is working fine.
STATUS.description: Sets the intial status of the Inspector.

STATE.default:
1
1
Integer : Floating.
2
Integer : Minimised.
3
Integer : Maximised with event viewer.
STATE.description: Sets the intial state of the Inspector.

STRINGS.default:
An object literal with the properties shown below:
close
String : The string to use for the close icon. Defaults to "Close".
header_text
String : The string to use for the header text.
footer_text
String : The string to use for the footer text.
success_message
String : The string to use for the success message.
STRINGS.description: UI Strings used by the Panel

params.name: el
params.description: The element ID representing the Inspector OR

params.name: userConfig
params.description:
The configuration object literal containing 
the configuration that should be set for this Inspector. See configuration 
documentation for more details.

constructors.description:
Inspector is an implementation of Panel with custom rendering of data added 
to an Accordion from events fired by the jsHub.org core tag (and more).

renderHubEvent.description: CustomEvent fired after processing a Hub Event via a jsHub.bind callback

checksumCodeEvent.description: CustomEvent fired after SHA1 checksumming a src JS file

changeStatusEvent.description: CustomEvent fired after changing the state of the UI

newHubEvent.description: CustomEvent fired after receiving a Hub Event via a jsHub.bind callback

foundCodeEvent.description: CustomEvent fired after detecting the jsHub core lib

clickLauncher.description: "click" event handler for Launcher Module that changes UI state

return.description: Success or failure of the render

render.description: The Inspector can only be rendered inside its correct CSS context which is created on beforeRenderEvent.

_doClose.description: Event handler overrides the default close method, instead switching to state1

return.description: the string identifier (used for CSS classes, etc)

clickSmallButton.description: "click" event handler for Small Button Module that changes UI state

initEvents.description:
Initializes the custom events for the Inspector which are fired 
automatically at appropriate times.

params.name: el
params.description: The element ID representing the Inspector OR

params.name: userConfig
params.description:
The configuration object literal 
containing the configuration that should be set for this Inspector. 
See configuration documentation for more details.

init.description:
The Inspector initialization method is automatically called by the 
constructor, and  sets up all custom events and event handlers.

getHubPluginInfo.description: "codeFound" event handler to get the Hub Plugins

addEventToPanel.description: "renderHubEvent" event handler that adds a Module to an Accordion Panel depending on Hub Event type

toString.description: Provides a readable name for the Inspector instance.

getAllAccordionPanelContent.description:
find all the Accordion panel(s) content areas
This is dependent on the DOM structure of the Accordion staying as UL>LI>A+DIV
TODO: use CSS selectors with COMPONENTS.event_list.CLASSES.CONTENT, rather than DOM methods

recievedHubEvent.description: "newHubEvent" event handler that processes the Hub Event and hands off for rendering.

_addHubEvent.description: Adds an event to a Panel (for UI dev only).

jsHubIsPresent.description: "init" method. See if a jsHub core lib is present, bind to it and add a class to indicate the jsHub core state in the UI

getActiveAccordionPanelContent.description:
find the Accordion open/active panel(s) content area
This is dependent on the DOM structure of the Accordion staying as UL>LI>A+DIV
TODO: use CSS selectors and COMPONENTS.event_list.CLASSES.TOGGLE && CONTENT, rather than DOM methods

clickLargeButton.description: "click" event handler for Large Button Module that changes UI state

srcChecksum.description: "foundCode" event handler that creates a SHA1 hash for a src JS file and checks it against a Configurator.

_setCurrentState.description: Sets the Inspectors current state (for UI dev only).

_setCurrentStatus.description: Gets the Inspectors current status (for UI dev only).

initDefaultConfig.description:
Initializes the class's configurable properties which can be changed 
using the Inspector's Config object (cfg).

TEMPLATES.description:
Constant holder for template HTML 
TODO: Move more of these into STRINGS for use with format()

Inspector.ID_CONTAINER.description:
Constant representing the default ID used for an Inspector's 
wrapping container

PANEL_MAPPINGS.description:
Constant representing the mapping of jsHub events to AccordionView Panels for display
"jsHub event string Id": "Inspector panel string Id in PANELS"
TODO: use these in receivedHubEvent

META.description: Constant representing the Inspector's metadata properties

EVENT_TYPES.description: Constant representing the name of the Inspector's YUI events

COMPONENTS.description:
Constant holder for references to related/nested components, 
e.g. Content Modules, AccordionViews, Resizers, etc

Inspector.CSS_STATE_PREFIX.description:
Constant representing the prefix used for an Inspector's state CSS class
in combination with the DEFAULT_CONFIG.STATE property

PANELS.description: Constant representing the Inspector's AccordionView Panels

Inspector.ID_ACCORDION.description:
Constant representing the default ID used for an Inspector's nested 
AccordionView instance

DEFAULT_CONFIG.description: Constant representing the Inspector's YUI configuration properties

YAHOO.JSHUB_ORG.Inspector.description:
Inspector is an implementation of Panel with custom rendering of data added 
to an Accordion from events fired by the jsHub.org core tag (and more).
